title: Apartments for rent across from CSUN
posting_body: ['The Heights on Superior Apartment Homes For Rent!', 'Enjoy living in sunny Southern California at our Northridge apartments.', 'Our community boasts spacious floor plans and luxury amenities.', 'Plus, we are located across from Cal State University, Northridge so we have apartments near CSUN.', 'NMS Northridge is also close to major shopping, hiking, and dining destinations.', 'Explore our apartments for rent in the San Fernando Valley.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 56', 'OR Text', '56', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 900 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Gas Stove', '- Wood Flooring', '- Granite/Graphite Countertops', '- Dishwasher', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Balcony/Patio', '- Carpet', '- High Vaulted Ceilings', '- Refrigerator', '- Central AC/Heat With Nest Thermostat', '- Extended Spacious Closets/Storage', '- Microwave', '- Cable/Internet Ready', '- Private Garages/Assigned Parking', '- Modern Style Renovated Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- On-Site Management', '- Spa', '- Pet Friendly', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Courtesy Patrol', '- Fitness Center', '- Pool', '- Controlled Access', '- Recreation Room', '- Computer/Gaming Room', 'Pet Policy', 'Apartment home allows up to 2 pets per home with a $500 pet deposit per animal and a $50 monthly pet rent per animal.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent amount for applicants and 5 times the rent amount for guarantors', 'Driving Directions', 'We are on the corner of Zelzah and Superior.', 'The Leasing entrance is on Zelzah at 9710 Zelzah Ave.', 'Northridge, CA. 91325', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Northridge', '9710 Zelzah Avenue,
